slides.title: Welcome to YourServer.com
slides.subtitle: Everything you need to begin is here—download, install, and jump into the adventure in minutes.

slides.title: How to Start
slides.subtitle: Choose your install folder and click Install. The client will download and unpack automatically.

slides.title: Security & Performance
slides.subtitle: We add your chosen folder to Windows Defender exclusions to prevent false positives and speed up patching.

slides.title: You’re All Set!
slides.subtitle: Open the client folder and launch the game. Need an account? Create one at YourServer.com.
